channel.title: Vantage-pk.info - Flawless - Unique Features - IPB Forums
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://vantage-pk.info/public/style_images/9_logo.png[/img]
[B]Why Vantage PK?[/B]
Our Mission at Vantage PK was to create a PK server that is not another carbon copy PK Server like nearly every pk based server in existence. At Vantage PK we provide you with a unique pking experience like no other! The only question is, are you ready?
[B]Links:[/B]
[IMG]http://www.cds.ca/cdsclearinghome.nsf/arrow_icon.gif[/img] [url=http://vantage-pk.info/]Home[/url]
[IMG]http://www.cds.ca/cdsclearinghome.nsf/arrow_icon.gif[/img] [url=http://vantage-pk.info/]Forums[/url]
[IMG]http://www.cds.ca/cdsclearinghome.nsf/arrow_icon.gif[/img] [url=http://vantage-pk.info/play.php]Play Now![/url]
[B][U]Features:[/U][/B]
- Flawless Switching - Flawless Combat - Duel Arena -> Dupe Free! - 100% Uptime - Boss Points - Custom Skilling Area -> All Skills 100% - Active Pure and Main PKing - Log in and PK - Custom Shops -> Reasonable prices - PK Shop - Pest Control - Barrows - Unique Bosses -> Some located in Wildness/Safe zones
[B][U]Media:[/U][/B]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/RKiPxwN.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/8NUowfd.png[/img]

[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/P10uphE.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/INS4RAE.png[/img]
[IMG]http://img706.imageshack.us/img706/2015/wumo.png[/img]
[IMG]http://img843.imageshack.us/img843/7481/fv4c.png[/img]

[/CENTER]

item.description:
@aquikzebra wrote:

[CENTER]

Why Vantage PK?

Our Mission at Vantage PK was to create a PK server that is not another carbon copy PK Server like nearly every pk based server in existence. At Vantage PK we provide you with a unique pking experience like no other! The only question is, are you ready?

Links:

Home

Forums

Play Now!

Features:

  • Flawless Switching
  • Flawless Combat
  • Duel Arena -> Dupe Free!
  • 100% Uptime
  • Boss Points
  • Custom Skilling Area -> All Skills 100%
  • Active Pure and Main PKing
  • Log in and PK
  • Custom Shops -> Reasonable prices
  • PK Shop
  • Pest Control
  • Barrows
  • Unique Bosses -> Some located in Wildness/Safe zones
